name: GORID-19 (Post ludum-dare)
description:
Save the gorbins from the plague!

The Common Gorbin Cold, The Barely deadly Gorbinfluenza, The Novel Goronavirus disease 3219, and the killer Egola

Test the gorbins for the disease

Send them to quarantine to stop the spread

All to stop this:

GORID-19 is a game about a pandemic going through the Gorbin empire, you, the Empire’s leader has to quarantine and test anybody with symptoms, and even restrict travel between the four planets.

Changelog:

4/22/2020: made gorbins bigger, and return home after quarantine
